entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:21 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 2:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. A few flurries or periods of freezing rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
